mapper.sql: id, user_id, bill_type, pay_type, bill_status, transtion_sn, external_sn, amount, finish_time, remark, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into zj_user_bill (user_id, bill_type, pay_type, bill_status, transtion_sn, external_sn, amount, finish_time, remark, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{billType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{transtionSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update: update zj_user_bill set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bill_status = #{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, transtion_sn = #{transtionSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, external_sn = #{externalSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, bill_type, pay_type, bill_status, transtion_sn, external_sn, amount, finish_time, remark, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from zj_user_bill where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, bill_type, pay_type, bill_status, transtion_sn, external_sn, amount, finish_time, remark, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from zj_user_bill

select
from zj_user_bill where transtion_sn = #{sn} limit 1
